title: DistortionSoundEffect

    "title": "DistortionSoundEffect",

    "content": "This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: DistortionSoundEffect
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Distorts audio, making it sound fuzzier and overdriven.
description: |
  A distortion effect is used to simulate the effect that would occur when
  overdriving older style audio equipment (such as vacuum tubes). This effect
  causes clipping in the sound and adds a general "fuzziness".

  Like all other Class.SoundEffect, a DistortionSoundEffect can be applied
  either to a Class.Sound or Class.SoundGroup by being parented to either.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - SoundEffect
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: DistortionSoundEffect.Level
    summary: |
      The intensity of the effect.
    description: |
      Range: 0 to 1 (default 0.5) The intensity of the effect. Setting this
      property to its minimum (0) will cause no distortion at all.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - LegacySound
methods: []
events: []
callbacks: []",
    "source": "DistortionSoundEffect.yaml"
